testcase.name: Add item to the Cart
testcase.system-out: Given guest user navigate Amazon Website....................................passed Then guest user should be in amazon home page...............................passed Given guest user navigate to computers And Tablets Page.....................passed And guest user click on samsung filter......................................passed When guest user click on product "2" block..................................passed And guest user click on Add to cart button..................................passed Then carts items increases by one...........................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given guest user navigate Amazon Website....................................passed Then guest user should be in amazon home page...............................passed Given guest user navigate to computers And Tablets Page.....................passed And guest user click on samsung filter......................................passed When guest user click on product "2" block..................................passed And guest user click on Add to cart button..................................passed When guest user navigate to cart............................................passed And guest user Delete added product.........................................passed Then check cart items decreased by one......................................passed
